name: Sheen Hydrating Lip Balm SPF50
about: What it is: A tinted lip balm-gloss with SPF 50 that protects the sensitive skin of your lips and nourishes with lanolin for a softer, smoother pout—Australian made and tested...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Balm..Highlighted Ingredients:.- SPF 50 UVA and UVB Filters: Protect the delicate skin of lips from visible signs of premature aging..- Sustainable Lanolin: Highly moisturizing to restore and nourish cracked and chapped lips..- Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E: Provide visible pout-plumping hydration and form a protective barrier on lips...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: A non-sticky, thoroughly nourishing lip balm with a hint of a tint.
ingredients: -Lanolin: Nourishes dry, flaky skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple..-Shea Butter: Intensely nourishes and protects..-UVA and UVB Filters: Protect your lips, visibly preventing pigmentation, fine lines, and signs of premature aging...Octinoxate 5%, Octocrylene 4.7%, Avobenzone 3%, Lanolin, Theobroma Cacao.(Cocoa) Seed Butter, Beeswax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil, Flavor, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil +/– Titanium Dioxide, Mica, CI 15850, CI 45410, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 17200, CI 77499.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Pucker up and swipe on with the pout-hugging applicator whenever your lips need a little TLC, but especially when you’re out and about in the sun.

reviews.review_text: This product was so good for my lips, I tried both colours and it was hydrating and made my lips healthy with the spf! I would highly recommend buying this item for every day use to protect your lips from the sun!
